Html:
Hi Laurent,

I built a Windows Store style app with MVVM Light and I'm getting a certification test failure on requirement 3.10, the Direct3D feature part of the test.  I went back and ran the certification on a BlankApp and then the base MVVM Light.  On the BlankApp I don't get the cert error but on the base MVVM Light application I do.  I also then ran the test on the app from your recent MSDN article and get the error on that app as well. My questions are then,

* do you see this error on the apps you build?  (if not, then I'm probably looking for something in my hardware setup, though I've tried this on two boxes)

* and, if not, do you have any ideas as to where I might look?  As I say, the BlankApp template didn't return an error but the base MVVM Light template app did (at least on my boxes).

Thanks
I've been working with a MS tech and it seems this test issue is related to my boxes as he doesn't repro the error on his machine.  Sorry for the report; thanks for MVVM Light!
